original_title: Paris Olympics: Sri Lanka’s Aruna Darshana disqualified in semi-final
original_body_lines: Sri Lankan sprinter Aruna Darshana finished in 5th place in the 2nd Semi-Final of the Men’s 400m event at the Paris Olympics, however was later disqualified.
Darshana had finished the race with a time of 44.75 seconds, setting a new personal best, however, he was disqualified later for a lane infringement.
